title: The Dark Knight Rises: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Dan Kois discuss Christopher Nolan's The Dark Knight Rises. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
